text:
Our users have never noticed any issues with their images in ECi from BABB clearing methods that they're verified with confocal.

ECi also reacts with plastic over time, right? So still keep it in glass!

We noticed a dark core in our samples too, like Peter, which doesn't make sense for autofluorescence (uniform), but that could just be a DISCO-relevant clearing issue, not ECi specific.
